articles.title: NASA's Hubble Space Telescope Captures Open Star Cluster Glittering In A Nearby Galaxy - NDTV
articles.description: American space agency NASA's Hubble Space Telescope recently captured a stunning image of a beautiful open star cluster called NGC 1858, located in an area full of star-forming regions.
articles.content:
NASA astronomers believe that this star cluster is around 10 million years old.

articles.title: Trump suggestion of ‘termination’ of Constitution draws few GOP rebukes - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump’s posts represent an escalation in his attacks on American institutions — one that scholars say must be heeded as a sign of how far he is willing to go to regain power.
